name: ECNMY Firefox Theme
description:
A nice minimal interface skin.  Works well with simple skins.
I'll try to keep this updated as there's sure to be bugs being my first theme. :P

This is released with permission from Mokocchi...
https://userstyles.org/users/268662

It's a deep mod of her theme Moko Firefox Theme found here...
https://userstyles.org/styles/105352/moko-firefox-theme

~ Go into Customize and make sure that the Title Bar button is selected.

user.name: Jamie Green
user.about:
I'm a Windows Visual Style designer hobbyist.  I go by the name of neiio on deviantart.

Check out my profile there for skins, icons, wallpapers and more!
